description:
Welcome to The Smurfs: Colorful Stories, a place where your creativity and imagination lead to creating unique tales. Visit their village like you are one of them and experience amazing adventures - Smurfs can’t wait to meet you!


ALL CHARACTERS IN ONE PLACE
You don’t have to worry you will miss your favourite Smurfette or Grouchy Smurf. They all gathered here, so you can get to know each one of them, while they tell you their stories. Just relax and take a look at what they have prepared for you.


MULTIPLE TOOLS
In order to make every story personal, the game offers a lot of tools to choose from. You decide what color, brush size, or tool type to use. Try to mix different options to achieve a surprising effect. 



KEY FEATURES:
- All your favourite blue creatures!
- 14 categories full of drawings
- Unlimited options for creating your personal story
- Cartoon type soundtrack
name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories
